original_text: Every clever person who has special skills must come to help. They must make all these things that the Lord has commanded: 11 the tabernacle, with the tent and the other material that covers it; the rings, boards, sticks, poles and bases that are part of the tabernacle; 12 the Covenant Box, with its poles, its special lid and the curtain that hides it; 13 the special table with its poles and all its dishes; the special bread that you will put on the table for the Lord; 14 the lampstand that will give light and its tools; the lamps and the oil for the lamps; 15 the altar for incense and its poles; the special oil and the sweet incense; the curtain for the entrance of the tabernacle; 16 the altar for burnt offerings and its bronze net; the poles for this altar and all its tools; the large bowl for water and its base; 17 the curtains for the yard, its poles and their bases; the curtain for the entrance of the yard; 18 pegs to fix the tent to the ground; pegs and ropes to hold the curtain around the yard; 19 the special clothes for Aaron and his sons to wear when they serve the Lord as priests in the Holy Place.’ Every clever person who has special skills must come to help. They must make all these things that the Lord has commanded:
korean_text: 무릇 너희 중 마음이 지혜로운 자는 와서 여호와께서 명령하신 것을 다 만들지니

sentences.original_text: Every clever person who has special skills must come to help
sentences.korean_translation: 특별한 기술을 가진 모든 영리한 사람은 도와야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They must make all these things that the Lord has commanded
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 주님께서 명령하신 모든 것을 만들어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: the tabernacle
sentences.korean_translation: 성막

sentences.original_text: with the tent and the other material that covers it
sentences.korean_translation: 장막과 그것을 덮는 다른 재료와 함께

sentences.original_text: the rings, boards, sticks, poles and bases
sentences.korean_translation: 고리, 널판지, 막대기, 기둥과 받침

sentences.original_text: that are part of the tabernacle
sentences.korean_translation: 성막의 일부인 것들

sentences.original_text: the Covenant Box
sentences.korean_translation: 언약 궤

sentences.original_text: with its poles, its special lid and the curtain that hides it
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 채들, 특별한 뚜껑과 그것을 숨기는 휘장과 함께

sentences.original_text: the special table with its poles and all its dishes
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 채들과 모든 그릇과 함께 있는 특별한 탁자

sentences.original_text: the special bread that you will put on the table for the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 주님을 위해 탁자에 놓을 특별한 빵

sentences.original_text: the lampstand that will give light and its tools
sentences.korean_translation: 빛을 줄 촛대와 그것의 도구들

sentences.original_text: the lamps and the oil for the lamps
sentences.korean_translation: 등들과 등을 위한 기름

sentences.original_text: the altar for incense and its poles
sentences.korean_translation: 향단과 그것의 채들

sentences.original_text: the special oil and the sweet incense
sentences.korean_translation: 특별한 기름과 향기로운 향

sentences.original_text: the curtain for the entrance of the tabernacle
sentences.korean_translation: 성막 입구의 휘장

sentences.original_text: the altar for burnt offerings and its bronze net
sentences.korean_translation: 번제단과 그것의 놋그물

sentences.original_text: the poles for this altar and all its tools
sentences.korean_translation: 이 단을 위한 채들과 그것의 모든 도구들

sentences.original_text: the large bowl for water and its base
sentences.korean_translation: 물을 위한 큰 대야와 그것의 받침

sentences.original_text: the curtains for the yard, its poles and their bases
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰을 위한 휘장들, 그것의 기둥들과 그들의 받침들

sentences.original_text: the curtain for the entrance of the yard
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰 입구의 휘장

sentences.original_text: pegs to fix the tent to the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 장막을 땅에 고정하기 위한 말뚝들

sentences.original_text: pegs and ropes to hold the curtain around the yard
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰 주위의 휘장을 고정하기 위한 말뚝들과 밧줄들

sentences.original_text: the special clothes for Aaron and his sons to wear
sentences.korean_translation: 아론과 그의 아들들이 입을 특별한 옷들

sentences.original_text: when they serve the Lord as priests in the Holy Place
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 성소에서 주님을 위해 제사장으로 섬길 때
